title: Giro d’Italia Stage 13: Echelons Can’t Stop Milan in Sprint Ahead of Decisive GC Weekend
content:
Sprinters duel in transition stage disrupted by Ineos-induced echelons ahead of a string of critical stages that will decide the winner of the 2024 pink jersey: 'Something happens every stage.'

Read the full article at Giro d’Italia Stage 13: Echelons Can’t Stop Milan in Sprint Ahead of Decisive GC Weekend on Velo.
author: ahood
